shortdesc.ph: Registers a video frame observer object.

section.p: You need to implement the class in this method and register callbacks according to your scenarios. After you successfully register the video frame observer, the SDK triggers the registered callbacks each time a video frame is received.

ul.li:
When handling the video data returned in the callbacks, pay attention to the changes in the width and height parameters, which may be adapted under the following circumstances:
When the network condition deteriorates, the video resolution decreases incrementally.
If the user adjusts the video profile, the resolution of the video returned in the callbacks also changes.
Ensure that you call this method before joining a channel.

pd.p: The observer object instance. Set the value as to release the instance. See .
